How To
=======

Everything is based on the command **tmr**.

``tmr -i or --init``
----------------------

This initializes the database. It only needs to be run once after installing tmr.

``tmr -s or --start TITLE``
----------------------------

Starts a timer with the title of TITLE.

``tmr -e or --end TITLE``
--------------------------

Stop timer with the title TITLE.

``tmr -l or --list``
-----------------------

List all running timers.
